title: Get Apple’s 35W dual USB-C port charger for just the right price in this early Prime Day sale
content:
Macworld

Apple products are always high quality, but they can also be rather expensive, so we’re always glad when we see a sensible discount, especially for essential items, like power adapters. This brings us to this $20 off deal available at Amazon for the 35W dual USB-C port power adapter, making this tiny device only $40 right now.

If you’re like me, juggling multiple devices can be a hassle. Thankfully, this Apple power adapter allows you to charge two devices at once, including your MacBook and iPhone. This will definitely come in handy when you’re out and about or trying to manage your outlets. One of the standout features of this particular power adapter is its compact size. While still powerful enough to charge all your devices, its small size makes it perfect to slip into your bag or pocket if need be. The folding prongs add to this adapter’s portability.

Imagine the convenience of having one adapter that does it all. It’s sleek, practical, and now more affordable than ever as it hits its best price level. So go ahead and place your order for the $40 Apple 35W dual USB-C power adapter while the deal is still active.
